Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the campaign finance board.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution authorizing the Speaker to file or join amicus briefs on behalf of the Council in the litigation captioned Shelby County v. Holder, currently pending before the United States Supreme Court, for the purpose of supporting the federal government’s position that Section 5 of the Voting Rights Act is constitutional.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Authorizing the Speaker to file or join amicus briefs on behalf of the Council in the litigation captioned Shelby County v. Holder.

Holder, currently pending before the United States Supreme Court, for the purpose of supporting the federal government’s position that Section 5 of the Voting Rights Act is constitutional.
